title: Easy venison meatloaf
ingredients: ['450g minced venison', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '8 crackers, crushed', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon prepared mustard', '1/4 teaspoon dried coriander', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon dried onion flakes', '1/4 teaspoon ground thyme', '1 dash cinnamon', '1 dash paprika', '3 tablespoons ketchup', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar']
